rows.label: qst700702_msg0001
rows.name:
We're desperately short-handed, thus
clearing of rubble from the residential
and shopping wards has been slow.

rows.label: qst700702_msg0002
rows.name:
I appreciate your help in our time of
need! Thank you so much! But, ah...
Please don't push yourselves!

rows.label: qst700702_msg0003
rows.name:
And definitely don't injure yourselves
on our account! I'd never forgive myself
if any harm befell you!

rows.label: qst700702_msg0004
rows.name:
So, you know. Lift from the legs
and all that. Good form, safety first,
yadda yadda...

rows.label: qst700702_msg0101
rows.name:
Oho!
Is the wreckage all cleared out, then?

rows.label: qst700702_msg0102
rows.name:
Thank you very much! With that done,
we need only fix up the gardens and
the capital will be back to its old glory!

rows.label: qst700702_msg0103
rows.name:
The tools and workers I have already
assembled, so could you please give
our head gardener the go-ahead?

rows.label: qst700702_msg0104
rows.name:
He's a man called Bry.
He should be waiting in the gardens...

rows.label: qst700702_msg0201
rows.name:
The tools and workers I have already
assembled, so could you please give
our head gardener the go-ahead?

rows.label: qst700702_msg0202
rows.name:
He's a man called Bry.
He should be waiting in the gardens...
